shows.title: Sustainababble vs Festivals
shows.desc:
The popular comedy environment podcast risks alienating the entire audience by getting snarky about festivals and festival-goers for a one-off special. Spoilers: the planet won’t thank you for telling thousands of people to drive to a field for a party.

Dave and Ol are the hosts of Sustainababble, a topical, funny and (hopefully) cathartic podcast about the environment.
